channel.title: Jarring Issue: "Could not find/load main class client"
channel.description:
Hello there, first of all I jar everything correctly, as well as having the correct cachedownloader, second after all of that! I ran into a jar issue the .bat is tell me that it "could not find/load main class client" third I am using drop box.
There fore have anybody ran into the same issue before?
Noobs please do not tell me to change my jdk version... it is up to date. thank you.
Thank you to all. ;)

item.title: Jarring Issue: "Could not find/load main class client"

first of all I jar everything correctly, as well as having the correct cachedownloader,
second after all of that! I ran into a jar issue the .bat is tell me that it "could not find/load main class client"
third I am using drop box.

There fore have anybody ran into the same issue before?

are u sure its client some clients run on Jframe also

Noobs please do not tell me to change my jdk version… it is up to date. thank you.

Thank you to all. ;)[/quote]
